summary: New NPC merchant, dealing in +sized armors.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][COLOR=#f79646][SIZE=6][B][I]Welcome to Fat Bastards[/I][/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]This mod adds a new blacksmith shop, with two new NPCs. The shop is located south east [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]of Morthal(shown on map). The shop sells armors and weapons just like any blacksmith, [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][B][I][COLOR=#f79646]but also sells vanilla armors which have been converted to fit the [/COLOR][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51308/?][COLOR=#92cddc]"Fat Bastard Body [/COLOR][/URL][/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51308/?][B][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][I][COLOR=#92cddc]
[/COLOR][/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/URL][/CENTER][CENTER][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51308/?][B][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][I][COLOR=#92cddc]Replacer"[/COLOR][/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/URL][B][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][I][COLOR=#92cddc].[/COLOR][COLOR=#f79646] The converted armors are not upgradable, but have higher stats. For example [/COLOR][/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]heavy armors add 20 points to base stats, but also 20 points to weight, for light [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]armors the increase is 10/10. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Armors currently included:[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Thieves Guild[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Dwarven[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Steel Plate[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Dawnguard[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Dark Brotherhood[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Orcish[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Stormcloak[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Imperial[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Some unfinished armors can be found in QASmoke testing cell. These are playable, but [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]unfinished, mainly for preview/feedback purposes. The shop has some nice loot laying [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]around for thieves, but DO NOT get caught! This mod is a WIP, and will be updated if it [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]is received well, so please leave feedback in the comments section. The armors may clip [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]with some custom animations, this is to be expected, and out of my control. However, [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]there may also be Vertex weight issues with some of the armors (ones in testing cell [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]for sure) this I can fix. If you see any issues, please post a screen, this will make [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]them easier to fix. I also need feedback on the lighting of the shop, in my screens it [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]looks dark, I run Realvision ENB and ELFX, so your lighting may differ.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]This mod features assets from:[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#f79646][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][B][I][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii [/URL][/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#92cddc][B][I][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy[/URL][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#92cddc][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][B][I][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/URL][/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]Thank you to all the authors who gave me premission to use their work.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]This mod requires:[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#92cddc][B][I]DawnGuard DLC[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#f79646][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#92cddc][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][B][I][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/URL][/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]
author: foster
